European Court of Human Rights Watch

item.title: Open Letter to French Foreign Office Minister Catherine Colonna, French Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary, Consul General Guillaume Roy
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 13:53 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11_1353_0800_open_letter_to_colonna_lortholary_Redacted.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): I am publicly sharing an open letter addressed to French Foreign Affairs Minister Catherine Colonna (@MinColonna), Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary (@BLortholary), and Consul General Guillaume ROY. This letter concerns a deeply serious matter: the possibility of being… pic.twitter.com/iuTu24tC1n — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023

item.title: Formal notice sent to Neuberger Berman’s CEO Mr. George Walker regarding McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-03-16_0042_0800_formal_notice_to_george_walker_neuberger_berman_with_email_Redacted.pdf KEY POINT OF THIS EMAIL: I formally notified Neuberger Berman that “Neuberger Berman has invested in a company which has engaged in a pattern of racketeering activity” and that therefore “Neuberger Berman is about to commit the crime of money laundering as defined in 18 U.S.C. § 1957 and the purpose of this communication is to try to alert [them] of what has happened so far in the McDonald’s RICO case.

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski and Mahonri Manjarrez regarding the phone call incident to the FBI
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-15_2333_0800_email_to_adam_rogalski_and_mahonri_manjarrez_Redacted.pdf From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: FBI hanging up on me Date sent：2023-02-15 23:33 (Beijing time +0800) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist) Cc: U.S. Ambassador Burns, U.S. Ambassador Bauer, Edward Lehman, David K. Colapinto, Yves Strickler (I will try to update this section soon) BeijingACS@state.gov and ParisExec@state.gov, please forward this email to the Legal Attaché.

item.title: Email to Mahonri Manjarrez. Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist?
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist? Date sent：2023-01-27 17:32 (Beijing time +0800) To: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist) Cc: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Edward Lehman, and many more people (I will try to update this section soon) My reference for this case: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity Dear Mr. Manjarrez, As a victim of the transnational criminal enterprise orchestrated by the criminal entity McDonald’s Corporation, I would like to ask you three questions:

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski. Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist?
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist? Date sent：2023-01-27 17:32 (Beijing time +0800) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department) Cc: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist), Edward Lehman, and many more people (I will try to update this section soon) My reference for this case: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity Dear Mr. Rogalski, As a victim of the transnational criminal enterprise orchestrated by the criminal entity McDonald’s Corporation, I would like to ask you three questions:

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski. Are you back Mr. Rogalski? Who is the Special Agent in Charge of the investigation?
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Are you back Mr. Rogalski? Who is the Special Agent in Charge of the investigation? Date sent：2023-01-20 15:35 (Beijing time +0800) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department) Cc: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist), Edward Lehman Dear Sir or Madam who will receive this email sent to BeijingACS@state.gov, please forward this email to the Legat office even though it seems that Mr. Rogalski’s email address is functional again.

item.title: Undeliverable Email Notification received on 2022-12-28 from postmaster@state.gov.
item.description:
From: postmaster@state.gov

To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

Subject: Undeliverable: NEW REFERENCE: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity

Date received: 2022-12-28 at 14:53 Beijing time (+0800)

item.title: Email sent on 2022-12-28 to the F.B.I.
item.description:
On 2022-12-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov, [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

Cc: Edward Lehman, Muyi Xiao (NYTimes), Kevin Granville (Business Editor at NYTimes), Constant Méheut (NYTimes), David Enrich (NYTimes), Michael Forsythe (NYTimes)

Bcc: Yves Strickler (French law professor)

Subject: NEW REFERENCE: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity

Date sent: 2022-12-28 at 14:49 Beijing time (+0800)

item.title: Email sent on 2022-05-12 to the F.B.I. and CCed to the U.S. Ambassadors to France and to China
item.description:
On 2022-05-12, I sent an email to the F.B.I. and CCed it to Denise BAUER, U.S. Ambassador to France, and Nicholas BURNS, U.S. Ambassador to China.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

CC : Denise Bauer (U.S. Ambassador), Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador), [REDACTED: the email was CCed to three additional people]

SUBJECT: I shared a folder with the FBI containing evidence

DATE: 2022-05-12 at 23:20 Beijing time

item.title: Sending the F.B.I. my reference for the case targeting McDonald’s Corporation for fraud and money laundering + additional warnings
item.description:
On 2022-04-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to give them my reference for the case targeting the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation for fraud and money laundering.

I am also reminding the F.B.I. that the law firm representing McDonald’s France was Péchenard & Associés, a law firm which belongs to and/or used to belong to the parents of the former General Director of the French National Police.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department)

SUBJECT: Case number McDonald’s

item.title: Whistle-blower asking the F.B.I. if they received and kept the emails which were sent in 2015 and if they ever launched a criminal investigation against McDonald’s Corporation
item.description:
On 2022-04-20, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to ask them if they ever received the emails I sent them back in 2015 regarding the major case targeting McDonald’s Corporation.

I also ask the F.B.I. if they ever launched a criminal investigation targeting the transnational criminal enterprise.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

SUBJECT: Has the FBI ever received the emails I sent in 2015?

item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the serious frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
Key point of this event: the F.B.I. is now formally notified of some of the crimes I am accusing McDonald’s Corporation and/or its subsidiary companies of.

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Subject:: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

item.title: Email sent to the F.B.I. about Xi Jinping (习近平), the President of the People’s Republic of China, and Li Keqiang (李克强), the Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the second email which was sent at 16:36 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez. It’s about the XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org websites.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Subject: XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org

item.title: Email sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.) informing them that I am now resuming my explanations.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the first email which was sent at 15:32 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

SUBJECT: Now resuming my explanations of the aggravated crimes McDonald’s committed

item.title: Answer sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.)
item.description:
From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Answer sent by email to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez on October 05, 2021, at 01:20 (am) Beijing time.

item.title: Email received from Assistant Legal Attaché Adam Rogalski – one of the FBI representatives in Beijing
item.description:
On 2021-09-20, I receive for the first time an email from Assistant Legal Attaché Adam Rogalski, “one of the FBI representatives in Beijing.”

FROM : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department)

TO : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

SUBJECT: Request to contact FBI office in Beijing
